If you've got uTorrent installed, the magnet link will open the download without the need for downloading the torrent file, which, in this case, is unreachable because some twat used "&", rather than "and", and some twat at TPB can't be bothered to escape his entities correctly.

You're right; the magnet link works.

The quality is surprisingly good. 
Unfortunately I'll just have to quote Tim himself: "Nothing ruins comedy like arenas"
..but the show is amazing nevertheless.
